strapiPost.title: Take The Guilt And The Guesswork Out Of Personal Finance With Centsei
strapiPost.content:
If you feel behind or stuck when it comes to money, you're not alone. That's why Dan and Kay created Centsei to help individuals and couples accelerate their finances with financial systems that actually work. 

  • Get unstuck: Centsei has helped over 1,400 people stop feeling guilty about spending money, clarify financial direction, get rid of debt, build up savings, invest with confidence, automate with the right financial tools, and implement a repeatable cycle that will help you accomplish any financial goal.
  • Free course: Dan and Kay are hosting a free online budgeting class on Jun 13 at 8p, discussing the four biggest mistakes most people make when it comes to saving and how to fix them, how to select the right tools to automate, how couples can stop fighting and work together towards both their dreams. 

If you're ready to figure out your finances, register HERE.
